mapper.select: select makeup_no as makeupNo, code, makeup_name as makeupName, makeup_tel as makeupTel, makeup_loc as makeupLoc, makeup_addr as makeupAddr, makeup_basic_price as makeupBasicPrice, makeup_parent_price as makeupParentPrice, makeup_visitor_price as makeupVisitorPrice, makeup_filename as makeupFilename, makeup_filepath as makeupFilepath, status, viewstatus, makeup_tag as makeupTag, makeup_latitude as makeupLatitude, makeup_longitud as makeupLongitud from makeup where status=1 and viewstatus=0

select makeup_no as makeupNo, code, makeup_name as makeupName, makeup_tel as makeupTel, makeup_loc as makeupLoc, makeup_addr as makeupAddr, makeup_basic_price as makeupBasicPrice, makeup_parent_price as makeupParentPrice, makeup_visitor_price as makeupVisitorPrice, makeup_filename as makeupFilename, makeup_filepath as makeupFilepath, status, viewstatus, makeup_tag as makeupTag, makeup_latitude as makeupLatitude, makeup_longitud as makeupLongitud from (select rownum as rnum, m.* from (select * from makeup where status=1 and viewstatus=0 order by makeup_no) m) where (rnum between #{start} and #{end}) order by rnum desc
